mapper.select: select * from (select id id, copyright_type right_type, works_name right_name, is_right_entrusted is_right_entrusted, audit_state audit_state, gmt_create create_time, gmt_modified updateTime from copyright_info WHERE user_id = #{userId} and gmt_create < #{t2} and gmt_create > #{t1} union all select id id, copyright_type right_type, copyright_name right_name, is_right_entrusted is_right_entrusted, audit_status state, gmt_create create_time, gmt_modified updateTime FROM reputation_portrait_info WHERE user_id = #{userId} and gmt_create < #{t2} and gmt_create > #{t1} union all select id id, copyright_type right_type, copyright_name works_name, is_right_entrusted is_right_entrusted, audit_status audit_state, gmt_create create_time, gmt_modified updateTime from other_right_info where user_id = #{userId} and gmt_create < #{t2} and gmt_create > #{t1}) s order by s.create_time desc limit #{num1},#{num2}

select * from (select id id, copyright_type right_type, works_name right_name, is_right_entrusted is_right_entrusted, audit_state audit_state, gmt_create create_time, gmt_modified updateTime from copyright_info WHERE user_id = #{userId} and gmt_create < #{t2} and gmt_create > #{t1} union all select id id, copyright_type right_type, copyright_name right_name, is_right_entrusted is_right_entrusted, audit_status state, gmt_create create_time, gmt_modified updateTime FROM reputation_portrait_info WHERE user_id = #{userId} and gmt_create < #{t2} and gmt_create > #{t1} union all select id id, copyright_type right_type, copyright_name works_name, is_right_entrusted is_right_entrusted, audit_status audit_state, gmt_create create_time, gmt_modified updateTime from other_right_info where user_id = #{userId} and gmt_create < #{t2} and gmt_create > #{t1}) s where s.right_type = #{rightType} order by s.create_time desc limit #{num1},#{num2}

select count(*) from (select id id from copyright_info WHERE user_id = #{userId} and gmt_create < #{t2} and gmt_create > #{t1} and works_name like "%"#{name}"%" union all select id id FROM reputation_portrait_info WHERE user_id=#{userId} and gmt_create<#{t2} and gmt_create>#{t1} and copyright_name like "%"#{name}"%" union all select id id from other_right_info where user_id=#{userId} and gmt_create<#{t2} and gmt_create>#{t1} and copyright_name like "%"#{name}"%") s

select * from (select id id, copyright_type right_type, works_name right_name, is_right_entrusted is_entrusted_protection, audit_state audit_state, gmt_create create_time, gmt_modified updateTime from copyright_info WHERE user_id = #{userId} and gmt_create < #{t2} and gmt_create > #{t1} and works_name like "%"#{name}"%" union all select id id, copyright_type right_type, copyright_name right_name, is_entrusted_protection is_entrusted_protection, audit_status audit_state, gmt_create create_time, gmt_modified updateTime FROM reputation_portrait_info WHERE user_id=#{userId} and gmt_create<#{t2} and gmt_create>#{t1} and copyright_name like "%"#{name}"%" union all select id id, copyright_type right_type, copyright_name works_name, is_entrusted_protection is_entrusted_protection, audit_status audit_state, gmt_create create_time, gmt_modified updateTime from other_right_info where user_id=#{userId} and gmt_create<#{t2} and gmt_create>#{t1} and copyright_name like "%"#{name}"%") s order by s.create_time desc limit #{num1},#{num2}

select count(*) from (select id id, copyright_type right_type, audit_state audit_state from copyright_info WHERE user_id = #{userId} and gmt_create < #{t2} and gmt_create > #{t1} and works_name like "%"#{name}"%" union all select id id, copyright_type right_type, audit_status audit_state FROM reputation_portrait_info WHERE user_id=#{userId} and gmt_create<#{t2} and gmt_create>#{t1} and copyright_name like "%"#{name}"%" union all select id id, copyright_type right_type, audit_status audit_state from other_right_info where user_id=#{userId} and gmt_create<#{t2} and gmt_create>#{t1} and copyright_name like "%"#{name}"%") s where s.right_type = #{rightType}

select * from (select id id, copyright_type right_type, works_name right_name, is_right_entrusted is_entrusted_protection, audit_state audit_state, gmt_create create_time, gmt_modified updateTime from copyright_info WHERE user_id = #{userId} and gmt_create < #{t2} and gmt_create > #{t1} and works_name like "%"#{name}"%" union all select id id, copyright_type right_type, copyright_name right_name, is_entrusted_protection is_entrusted_protection, audit_status audit_state, gmt_create create_time, gmt_modified updateTime FROM reputation_portrait_info WHERE user_id=#{userId} and gmt_create<#{t2} and gmt_create>#{t1} and copyright_name like "%"#{name}"%" union all select id id, copyright_type right_type, copyright_name works_name, is_entrusted_protection is_entrusted_protection, audit_status audit_state, gmt_create create_time, gmt_modified updateTime from other_right_info where user_id=#{userId} and gmt_create<#{t2} and gmt_create>#{t1} and copyright_name like "%"#{name}"%") s where s.right_type = #{rightType} order by s.create_time desc limit #{num1},#{num2}

select count(*) from (select id id, audit_state audit_state from copyright_info WHERE user_id = #{userId} and gmt_create < #{t2} and gmt_create > #{t1} and works_name like "%"#{name}"%" union all select id id, audit_status audit_state FROM reputation_portrait_info WHERE user_id=#{userId} and gmt_create<#{t2} and gmt_create>#{t1} and copyright_name like "%"#{name}"%" union all select id id, audit_status audit_state from other_right_info where user_id=#{userId} and gmt_create<#{t2} and gmt_create>#{t1} and copyright_name like "%"#{name}"%") s where s.audit_state = #{state}

select * from (select id id, copyright_type right_type, works_name right_name, is_right_entrusted is_entrusted_protection, audit_state audit_state, gmt_create create_time, gmt_modified updateTime from copyright_info WHERE user_id = #{userId} and gmt_create < #{t2} and gmt_create > #{t1} and works_name like "%"#{name}"%" union all select id id, copyright_type right_type, copyright_name right_name, is_entrusted_protection is_entrusted_protection, audit_status audit_state, gmt_create create_time, gmt_modified updateTime FROM reputation_portrait_info WHERE user_id=#{userId} and gmt_create<#{t2} and gmt_create>#{t1} and copyright_name like "%"#{name}"%" union all select id id, copyright_type right_type, copyright_name works_name, is_entrusted_protection is_entrusted_protection, audit_status audit_state, gmt_create create_time, gmt_modified updateTime from other_right_info where user_id=#{userId} and gmt_create<#{t2} and gmt_create>#{t1} and copyright_name like "%"#{name}"%") s where s.audit_state = #{state} order by s.create_time desc limit #{num1},#{num2}

select count(*) from (select id id, copyright_type right_type, audit_state audit_state from copyright_info WHERE user_id = #{userId} and gmt_create < #{t2} and gmt_create > #{t1} and works_name like "%"#{name}"%" union all select id id, copyright_type right_type, audit_status audit_state FROM reputation_portrait_info WHERE user_id=#{userId} and gmt_create<#{t2} and gmt_create>#{t1} and copyright_name like "%"#{name}"%" union all select id id, copyright_type right_type, audit_status audit_state from other_right_info where user_id=#{userId} and gmt_create<#{t2} and gmt_create>#{t1} and copyright_name like "%"#{name}"%") s where s.audit_state = #{state} and s.right_type = #{rightType}

select * from (select id id, copyright_type right_type, works_name right_name, is_right_entrusted is_entrusted_protection, audit_state audit_state, gmt_create create_time, gmt_modified updateTime from copyright_info WHERE user_id = #{userId} and gmt_create < #{t2} and gmt_create > #{t1} and works_name like "%"#{name}"%" union all select id id, copyright_type right_type, copyright_name right_name, is_entrusted_protection is_entrusted_protection, audit_status audit_state, gmt_create create_time, gmt_modified updateTime FROM reputation_portrait_info WHERE user_id=#{userId} and gmt_create<#{t2} and gmt_create>#{t1} and copyright_name like "%"#{name}"%" union all select id id, copyright_type right_type, copyright_name works_name, is_entrusted_protection is_entrusted_protection, audit_status audit_state, gmt_create create_time, gmt_modified updateTime from other_right_info where user_id=#{userId} and gmt_create<#{t2} and gmt_create>#{t1} and copyright_name like "%"#{name}"%") s where s.audit_state = #{state} and s.right_type = #{rightType} order by s.create_time desc limit #{num1},#{num2}
